data.title: Collection Tracker
data.description: Keep track of your collection. Know the amount of dust needed for a full cllection or for the collection only with your desired cards.
data.author: Hearthsim

data.title: Export to Hearthpwn
data.description: Export the selected deck to Hearthpwn or a TXT file. Use by selecting a deck and going to the plugins menu.
data.author: Judge2020

data.title: Arena Helper
data.description: Helps you pick cards in arena including an arena tier list with up-to-date scores of cards.
data.author: Rembound

data.title: Graveyard tracker
data.description: Track what minions have died on your side of the game. Useful for N'Zoth games.
data.author: RedHatter

data.title: BattleCry!
data.description: Play sounds when a minion is played. Default sound is JOHN CENA for mysterious challenger.
data.author: Falconmick

data.title: End Game
data.description: Gives you extra information at the end of a game.
data.author: andburn

data.title: Hearth Arena Uploader
data.description: Upload arena runs to Hearth Arena
data.author: riQQ

data.title: Trouble at the mill
data.description: show how much fatigue until death
data.author: realchriscasey

data.title: Hearthstone Treasury
data.description: Keep track of your gold and packs
data.author: arkein

data.title: Anyfin Calculator
data.description: Damage possible with your Anfin can Happen
data.author: ericBG
